pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, August 12, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Parkdale Intercultural Association to make an announcement and hold a brief media availability.

Parkdale Intercultural Association
1365 Queen Street West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:45 p.m.

Richmond Hill, Ontario

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community BBQ to celebrate Eid al-Adha. 

138 Yorkland Street

Notes for media:

  • Open Coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:45 p.m.
